product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: product_description
product.description: product description which appears as a collapsible text field

product.name: Recommended age group
product.description: Identifies the suitable age range for a product, typically toys and games; e.g. babies, teens

product.name: Toy/Game material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in a toy or game, such as plastic or wood
